name: Application Support Specialist
description:
Job description:

  • Serve as member of the level 2 support team, as point of contact for customers requiring technical support
  • Troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve technical hardware and/or software issues
  • Able to troubleshoot issues with 3rd party vendors in a professional manner
  • Advise customers on how to use the software and the various functions or features
  • Follow up with the users from the opening of the ticket to its complete resolution
  • Escalation of requests or incidents to level 3 support team
  • Training users on system functionality
  • Detect incidents or recurring requests for continuous improvement
  • May coordinate with other teams or departments to resolve user problems

Qualifications:

  • Bachelors or master’s degree
  • 2+ years support specialist or Help Desk related support experience
  • Prior experience documenting interactions and using an IT ticketing system (HelpDesk, Jira)
  • Ability to diagnose & address application issues
  • Written and verbal communication skills (English)
  • Able to work from home in a quiet area with Internet access
  • Experience in finance industry, preferable in the banking or mortgage area
